attributes.action: limit fear on our streets and implement a MANDATORY sentencing structure for any person carrying an unlicensed weapon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned determine to express their concerns and fears that are imposed by the culture of weapon-carrying on our streets and promote that the strengthening of laws and tightening of sentencing will help cultivate a sense of reclamation of our streets from the perpetuators of knife and gun crime.  This lethal and irresponsible activity must stop.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
